Answer.answer: and pulls his trusty spoons from his back pocket. With a quick rhythmic clatter
column5: providing Lavander with Bardic Inspiration. He then turns his attention to the chittering imps and snarling devil that are slashing at Rus. The spoons in his hand clack faster and faster as faint voices make themselves heard in the imps' minds. These voices intensify as Rubis continues casting Fear
column6: conjuring terrifying possibilities and magical horrors in their minds' eye.`
